UserStory.heading: Health Point
UserStory.Description: As a user, I want the game has a proper health point (HP) so that health status can be sufficiently determined and monitored.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 血量的显示，受到伤害时的血量变化。
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. It doesn't concern other features, even though it depends on how player performs. N - Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation. Confirmation of specific details can be negotiated. V - Yes. Users will be beneficial by knowing the status of the health point and make an appropriate step to save life if needs be. The player will have better in-game experience. E - Yes. It can be estimated how long it will take since it is a small feature. S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore completed in one iteration or Sprint. T - Yes. It can be tested and verified by playing the game.

Tests.Test: Check the value of damage taken by the player is deducted from the Health Point (HP).
The reduced Health Point (HP) is transparent(scene background).

UserStory.heading: Magic Point
UserStory.Descrpition: As a player, I want the game to have a Magic Point (MP) to restrict the player from using skills.
UserStory.DescrpitionZH: 玩家的魔法值，在魔法值不够时无法使用法术技能(可以自动恢复)
UserStory.INVEST:
I - Since this is a small User story, it is not depentdent on any other feature.
N - The story is a placeholder for a conversation, details can be negotiated later.
V - Users will benefit from this feature as it allows them to have a better experience while gaming.
E - We can estimate how long it will take since it is a small enough feature.
S - It is small feature so it can therefore fit into a sprint easily.
T - Tests were able to be created for it.

Tests.Test: The Magic Point(MP) must have color.
Check if the Magic Point(MP) is digested when using the spell.
Player unable to release spell skills when the MP is empty.
The reduced portion of Magic Point(MP) should be transparent (scene background).
